org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.handler

Class HBaseEdgeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.handler.HBaseElementHandler
      • org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.handler.HBaseGraphElementHandler
        • org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.handler.HBaseEdgeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EdgeHandler, ElementHandler, GraphElementHandler

    public class HBaseEdgeHandler
extends HBaseGraphElementHandler
implements EdgeHandler
    Used to read/write EPGM edge data from/to a HBase table.
    Edge data in HBase
    row-key meta data
    "0" label source target graphs since
    "knows" <Person.0> <Person.1> [0,1] 2014
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
